metadata.title: CVE-2024-32493 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Znuny LTS 6.5.1 through 6.5.7 and Znuny 7.0.1through 7.0.16 where a logged-in agent is able to inject SQL in the draftform ID parameter of an AJAX request.

criterions.comment: znuny package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
